Title.Language: Psali Adam for the Martyrdom of Saints Cosmas, Demian, etc.
ابصالية آدام لإستشهاد القديسين قزمان ودميان وأخوتهما وأمهما

Text.Language: Al/ywc tennah]: e~rok w~ penn/b Pi,rictoc: nai nan eybe ]macmou]: nem Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Truly, we believe in You, / O Christ our Master, / have mercy on us for the sake of the Mother of God, / and Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
بالحقيقة نؤمن \ بك يا سيدنا المسيح \ إرحمنا من أجل والدة الإله \ وقزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Bon niben cetaio~: n~niaylovoroc: nimatoi niref[ro: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Everyone honors / the struggle-mantled / victorious soldiers: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
كل أحد يكرم \ لابسوا الجهاد \ الجنود الغالبين \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Ge gar n~ywou au[ici: eybe noubacanoc: e~tausopou n~je naijwri: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
For they were exalted / for the sufferings they endured: / the strong Cosmas, / his brothers, and their mother.
لأنهم قد تعالوا \ من أجل عذاباتهم \ التى قبلوها هؤلاء الأقوياء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Dauid a~mou tenm/]: m~voou w~ pihumnodoc: eybe Kocma pinis]: nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
O David the hymnist, / come today in our midst / for the sake of Cosmas the great, / his brothers, and their mother.
يا داؤد تعال فى وسطنا \ اليوم ايها المرتل \ من أجل قزمان العظيم \ وأخوته وأمهم.
Eybe nimarturoc: nahmen w~ pia~gayoc: e~bol qen nipiracmoc: eybe nai genneoc.
Deliver us, O Good One, / from temptations / for the sake of / these brave martyrs.
من أجل الشهداء \ خلصنا أيها الصالح \ من التجارب من أجل \ هؤلاء الأبطال.
Zeos ne nis~v/ri: e~tauaitou qen P[oic: n~je naimarturoc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
In the Lord, / these martyrs did / many wonders: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
كثيرة هى العجائب \ التى صنعها بالرب \ هؤلاء الشهداء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
?ppe n/etswni: autal[wou qen P[oic: nem nijom nem nim/ini: n~je Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Behold, through the Lord / they healed the sick / with power and signs: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
هوذا المرضى \ قد شفاهم بالرب \ بالقوات والآيات \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Yel/l w~ nipictoc: qen v~ran n~]paryenoc: nem nimarturoc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Rejoice, O faithful, / in the name of the Virgin / and the martyrs: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
تهللوا أيها المؤمنين \ بإسم العذراء \ والشهداء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
I/couc Pi,rictoc Pennou]: pid/miourgoc: afcwtp n~nimainou]: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Jesus Christ, our God, / the Creator, chose / the God-loving: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
يسوع المسيح \ إلهنا الخالق \ إختار محبى الإله \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Kc~marwout a~l/ywc: nahmen qen nipiracmoc: eybe nimarturoc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Truly, blessed are You; / deliver us from temptations / for the sake of the martyrs: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
مبارك أنت بالحقيقة \ خلصنا من التجارب \ من أجل الشهداء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Laoc niben eurasi: qen v~ran n~nigenneoc: niref[ro nijwri: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
All people rejoice / in the names of the / strong victorious heroes: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
فتفرح كل الشعوب \ بإسم الأبطال \ الغالبين الأقوياء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Moi nan n~tekhir/n/: matajron qen teka~gap/: eybe ]hupomon/: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Grant us Your peace; / confirm us in Your love / for the sake of the patience of / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
إمنحنا سلامك \ وثبتنا فى محبتك \ من أجل صبر \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Nai nan cwtem e~ron: nahmen e~~bolha nidemwn: eybe nia~gwn: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Hear us and have mercy on us, / and deliver us from demons / for the sake of the struggles of / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
إسمعنا وارحمنا \ ونجنا من الشياطين \ من أجل جهادات \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Xap~swi e~masw: w~ nigenneoc: nimatoi niref[ro: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
You are greatly exalted, / O heroes, / the victorious soldiers: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
إرتفعتم جداً \ أيها الأبطال \ الجنود الغالبون \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Ounis] pe poutaio~: qen y~m/] n~ouranoc: e~hote n/eyouab t/rou: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Great is your honor / amid the heavens / more than all the saints, / O Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
عظيمة هى كرامتهم \ فى وسط السماوات \ أكثر من جميع القديسين \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Pouro n~te niourwou: af]jom n~nimarturoc: qen pih~mot afmahou: e~te Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
The King of kings / strengthened the martyrs / and filled them with grace: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
ملك الملوك \ قوى الشهداء \ وبالنعمة ملاهم \ أعنى قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Rasi w~ nipictoc: m~mainou] Pi,rictoc: eybe nimarturoc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Rejoice, O faithful / Christ-lovers, / for the sake of the martyrs: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
أفرحوا أيها المؤمنين \ محبى المسيح \ من أجل الشهداء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Comc cwtem e~~ron: qen nidiw~gmoc: eybe nidikeon: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Behold us and hear us / in our persecutions / for the sake of the righteous: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
انظر واستجب لنا \ فى الاضطهادات \ من أجل الأبرار \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Ten]ho eybe nimwou: nem nici] nem nikarpoc: eybe ni]ho: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
We ask You for / the waters, plants, and fruits / through the prayers of / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
نتضرع من أجل المياه \ والزروع والثمار \ من أجل توسلات \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Uioc Yeoc Pennou]: nohem m~peklaoc: eybe nimainou]: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
O Son of God, our God, / deliver Your people / for the sake of the God-lovers: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
يا ابن الله إلهنا \ خلص شعبك \ من أجل محبى الإله \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Vn/b penbo/~yoc: moi nan n~oumeroc: nem nimarturoc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
O Master, our Helper, / grant us a share / with the martyrs: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
أيها السيد معيننا \ أعطنا نصيباً \ مع الشهداء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
<ere ]paryenoc: Maria ]yeo~tokoc: ,ere nigenneoc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Hail to the Virgin, / Mary the Theotokos. / Hail to the heroes: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
السلام للعذراء \ مريم والدة الإله \ السلام للأبطال \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
"u,/ mam~ton mwou: qen piparadicoc: eybe niref[ro: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Repose the souls / in Paradise / for the sake of the victorious: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
الأنفس نيحها \ فى الفردوس \ من أجل الغالبين \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
W penn/b a~riv~meui~: m~pekbwk Nikoudimoc: eybe tekmau nem nijwri: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
O our Master, remember Your servant, / Nicodemus, for the sake / of Your mother and the strong: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
يا سيدنا أذكر \ عبدك نيقوديموس \ من أجل أمك والأقوياء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.

Title.Language: Psali Watos for the Martyrdom of Saints Cosmas, Demian, etc.
ابصالية واطس لإستشهاد القديسين قزمان ودميان وأخوتهما وأمهما

Text.Language: Annaerh/tc w~ namenra]: n~ten]w~ou n~I/couc Pi,rictoc: n~tentaio~ n~]macnou]: nem nia~gioc Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
We will begin, O beloved, / to glorify Jesus Christ, / so that we may honor the Mother of God, / and Saint Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
فلنبدأ يا أحبائى \ لنمجد يسوع المسيح \ ونكرم والدة الإله \ والقديسين قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Bwn n~nibal n~te nenka]: w~ pencwt/r n~a~gayoc: n~tenjw m~p~taio~ n~n/eyouab ninis]: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
O our Good Savior, / open the eyes of our minds / to utter the honor of the great saints: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
إفتح أعين أفهامنا \ يا مخلصنا الصالح \ لننطق بكرامة القديسين العظام \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Ge gar au[ici e~masw: n~je nimenra] n~te Pi,rictoc: nem ninis] m~bacanoc: e~tausopou n~je niaylovoroc.
For the Christ-lovers / were greatly exalted / by the intense tortures / these struggle-mantled ones endured.
لأنه قد ارتفع جداً \ أحباء المسيح \ بالعذابات العظيمة \ التى قبلها لابسو الجهاد.
Dauid a~mou tenm/] m~voou: n~tekjw m~p~taio~ n~naimarturoc: n~te Pi,rictoc p~ouro n~te p~~wou: e~te Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
O David, come into our midst today, / to utter the honor of these / martyrs of Christ, the King of Glory: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
تعال يا داؤد فى وسطنا اليوم \ لتنطق بكرامة هؤلاء الشهداء \ الذين للمسيح ملك المجد \ أعنى قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
E a~ niy~m/i ws e~bol ouoh P[oic: afcwtem e~rwou qen noudiw~gmoc: e~te nai ne nimarturoc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
The righteous cried out, / and in their persecution / the Lord heard these martyrs: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
لأن الأبرار صرخوا \ والرب استجاب لهم فى اضطهاداتهم \ أى هؤلاء الشهداء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Zeos ne ninis] m~m/ini: e~tauaitou n~je nigenneoc: qen t~jom m~Pi,rictoc pijwri: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
The heroes did / many great miracles / by the power of Christ the strong: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
كثيرة هى الآيات العظيمة \ التى صنعها الأبطال \ بقوة المسيح القوى \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
?ppe n/etswni autal[wou: nem nidemwn auhitou e~bol: nem n/e~tause e~p~semmo autacywou: nem nibelleu aunau m~bol.
Behold, they healed the sick, / exorcized demons, / returned travelers, / and restored sight to the blind.
هوذا المرضى قد شفوا \ والشياطين أخرجوا \ والمسافرون قد عادوا \ والعمى قد أبصروا.
Ywk te ]jom nem pitaio~: w~ I/couc Pi,rictoc pid/miourgoc: nai nan eybe niref[ro: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Thine is the power and honor, / O Jesus Christ the Creator; / have mercy on us for the sake of the victors: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
لك القوة والكرامة \ يا يسوع المسيح الخالق \ إرحمنا من أجل الغالبين \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
I/couc Pi,rictoc qen tenm/] m~voou: nem p~,wroc n~nefa~ggeloc: eybe pinis] n~taio~: n~te Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Jesus Christ is in our midst today, / with His angelic chorus / for the great honor of / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
يسوع المسيح فى وسطنا اليوم \ مع صفوف ملائكته \ من أجل الكرامة العظيمة \ التى لقزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Kalwc aui~ saron kalwc: n~je pijwri qen nimarturoc: Kocma nem Dimianoc nem Anyimoc: nem Leontioc nem Eup~rapioc.
Well and good they came to us, / the strong among the martyrs: / Cosmas, Demian, Anthimus, / Leontius, and Euprepius.
حسناً جاء إلينا حسناً \ الأقوياء فى الشهداء \ قزمان ودميان وأنثيموس \ ولونديوس وأرابيوس.
Laoc n~ni,~rictianoc: eurasi m~voou qen hanhumnoc: qen pijinerv~meui~ n~nia~gioc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
The Christian people / rejoice today with hymns / at the commemoration of Saints / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
الشعوب المسيحيون \ يفرحون اليوم بتسابيح \ فى تذكار القديسين \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Moi nan P[oic n~tekhir/n/: sa p~jwk e~bol n~ni,~ronoc: nem oucemni eybe nijwri: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
O Lord, grant us Your peace / and calmness until the end of times / for the sake of the strong, / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
أعطنا يا رب سلامك \ وطمأنينة إلى كمال الأزمان \ من أجل الأقوياء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Nai nan ouoh cwtem e~ron: qen nenhojhej nem nendiw~gmoc: w~li m~pekjwnt e~bol haron: eybe Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Hear us and have mercy on us / in our tribulations and persecutions, / and take away Your anger from us / for the sake of Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
إسمعنا وارحمنا \ فى ضيقاتنا واضطهادتنا \ وارفع غضبك عنا \ من أجل قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Xmarwout w~ penn/b Pi,rictoc: jemp~sini m~peklaoc: qen hannai eybe ]paryenoc: nem Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Blessed are You, O Christ our Master; / visit Your people with mercy / for the sake of the Virgin, / and Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
مبارك أنت يا سيدنا المسيح \ تعاهد شعبك \ بالمراحم من أجل العذراء \ وقزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Ouoh c~mou e~niiarwou: nem nici] nem nikarpoc: a~nitou e~p~swi eybe ni]ho: n~]yeo~tokoc nem nai marturoc.
Bless the rivers, plants, and fruits, / raise them through / the prayers of the Theotokos / and these martyrs.
وبارك الأنهار \ والزروع والأثمار \ أصعدها من أجل توسلات \ والدة الإله وهؤلاء الشهداء.
Penn/b jwr e~bol n~nijaji: n~te ]ekkl/cia w~ Pi,rictoc: nem p~co[ni n~te hanrwmi: euhwou w~ pimairwmi n~a~gayoc.
O Christ our Master, / disperse the enemies of the Church / and the counsel of the wicked, / O Good Lover of Mankind.
يا سيدنا فرق أعداء \ الكنيسة أيها المسيح \ ومشورة الناس الأشرار \ يا محب البشر الصالح.
Rasi w~ ni,~rictia~noc: qen v~ran m~Pen[oic I/couc Pi,rictoc: nem tefmau nem nimarturoc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Rejoice, O Christians, in the name / of our Lord Jesus Christ, / His mother, and the martyrs: / Cosmas, his brothers and their mother.
إفرحوا أيها المسيحيون \ بإسم ربنا يسوع المسيح \ وأمه والشهداء \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Comc ouoh cwtem e~ron: w~ pencwt/r n~a~gayoc: nahmen e~bolha nidemwn: eybe Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Behold us and hear us, / O our Good Savior, / deliver us from demons for the sake / of Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
انظر واستجب لنا \ يا مخلصنا الصالح \ ونجنا من الشياطين \ من أجل قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Ten]ho e~rok eybe niou/b: nem nidia~kwn nem nipictoc: nahmou eybe ten[oic n~n/b: Maria nem naimarturoc.
We ask You to deliver the priests, / the deacons, and the faithful / for the sake of our lady, / Queen Mary, and these martyrs.
نتوسل إليك من أجل الكهنة \ والشمامسة والمؤمنون \ خلصهم من أجل سيدتنا الملكة \ مريم وهؤلاء الشهداء.
Uioc Yeoc nahmen e~bol: ha pipethwou nem nipiracmoc: ,w nan n~nennobi e~bol: eybe Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
O Son of God, deliver us / from the evil one and temptations, / and forgive our sins for the sake of / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
يا ابن الله نجنا \ من الشرير والتجارب \ وإغفر لنا خطايانا \ من أجل قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
Vn/b Vnou] penbo/~yoc: [ici m~p~tap n~ni,~rictia~noc: eybe tekmau nem nigenneoc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
O Master, God our Helper, / raise the horn of the Christians / for the sake of Your mother and the heroes: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
أيها السيد الإله معيننا \ إرفع قرن المسيحيين \ من أجل أمك والأبطال \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
<ere ne w~ ]paryenoc: Maria ][rompi eynecwc: ,ere nwten w~ nigenneoc: Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Hail to you, O Virgin, / Mary the beautiful dove. / Hail to you, O heroes: / Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
السلام لك أيتها العذراء \ مريم الحمامة الحسنة \ السلام لكم أيها الأبطال \ قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
"u,/ niben moi nwou n~ou,~bob: qen kenf n~nenio] n~dikeoc: Abraam Icaak Iakwb: eybe Kocma nem nefc~n/ou nem toumau.
Repose every soul / in the bosom of our righteous fathers: / Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob / for the sake of Cosmas, his brothers, and their mother.
كل الأنفس أعطها برودة \ فى حضن أبائنا الأبرار \ إبراهيم واسحق ويعقوب \ من أجل قزمان واخوته وأمهم.
W penn/b a~ripameui~: a~nok pikermi Nikoudimoc: eybe tekmau nem n/eyouab nijwri: nem p~cepi n~ni,rictia~noc.
O our Master, remember me, / I, Nicodemus, who am ashes, / for the sake of Your mother and the strong saints / with the rest of the Christians.
يا سيدنا اذكرنى \ أنا الرماد نيقوديموس \ من أجل أمك والقديسين الأقوياء \ مع سائر المسيحيين.
